Text: ['Commandant, congrats on your vacation finally starting!']
["I'm jealous of you..."]
["Oh, it's nothing."]
['That "thing" Leonie was dying to whack? It\'s already shipped to the navigation point!']
['Thanks for running this errand, see you later!']
["You don't have any plans for today, do you, Commandant?"]
["I don't. Not yet."]
['I booked an afternoon tea and would like to enjoy it with you.']
["I'll come pick you up later."]
['Karenina, have you heard of the Flourish Guild?']
["[Auto-reply] I've been super busy recently! Sorry, I'm unavailable right now. Will get back to you when I can!"]
['Should I come back when you are not so busy...?']
['Should I come back when you are not so busy...?']
["Just fixing the bridges, nothing major. Tell me your story first. What's the Flourish Guild all about?"]
['Recently, some stores in the Square received threatening letters from the Flourish Guild, forcing them to join this organization.']
['Never heard of it, but I can check with Teddy.']
['Thanks, I appreciate it.']
["[Auto-reply] I've been super busy recently! Sorry, I'm unavailable right now. Will get back to you when I can!"]
['Not a big deal. Just make sure you thank me in person properly later.']
["[PlayerName], this Flourish Guild you are after isn't as simple as it seems."]
['That was fast.']
['Nothing major, I just had to crack a few dozen encrypted locks.']
["My service isn't free. You know the deal, right?"]
["I'll treat you to cherry-flavored electrolyte."]
['Deal. Make sure you deliver it in person☆!']
["I just backtracked part of the Spinning Top's transaction records and found some data on material smuggling and personnel trafficking."]
['Basically, the Flourish Guild appears to be a luxury goods trader on the surface, but has been secretly running shady businesses behind the scenes.', '43']
['This is getting serious.']
["Their intranet structure looked familiar, so I ran a cross-check—turns out it's exactly the same as Kurono's structure, according to Norman Corp's records."]
['Kurono?']
['Which means Kurono is likely backing the Flourish Guild.']
['Thanks, Teddy. That was really helpful.']
['No problem. Make sure you prep a few more cans of electrolyte if you run into any other problems!']
["Leonie, I'm on a mission near the Commercial Square. Mind if I borrow a few CUBs?"]
['Alright, what type would you like?']
["Mainly for Construct visitors to try out. I'll go with anything you recommend."]
["Just send them to [coordinates]. I'll sync with Celica."]
["Alright, I'll send these three little ones over right now!"]
["Speaking of which, Gaia prototype's new functionality has been implemented. Come help me test it out when you have time! I'll pay you!"]
['—You have added each other as friends. Start chatting!—']
['We take dessert reservations and custom orders. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need anything.']
["I've found a special dessert that AI can't make."]
['The ingredients are: flour, butter, white sugar, and a sincere smile for the customer.']
['Wait! Stop! How do you know that line?']
['From the owner of Genius Board Game Shop.']
['Grey?! I knew it was him! Ah—this is so embarrassing... Why did I use such a catchphrase before?']
['What was I thinking? I actually believed that a smile alone could make desserts taste better... The really important factor is the technique!']
["Sometimes, a sincere smile can indeed affect how the customer feels. You've put that into practice before, so you probably understand it better than I do."]
['...But how can that so-called sincerity surpass the precision of AI craftsmanship?']
["Some believe AI craftsmanship is unbeatable; others insist emotions give desserts unique value. You'll have to find the answer to that question yourself."]
['But to do that, you need to be still in the game.']
["So why don't you keep working on your skills and see what happens? We'll do our best to support you."]
['Always serve the customer with a sincere smile... That was the vow I made when I sold my first dessert. But over time, I have forgotten that and got lost in endless debates with no conclusion.']

['Even if what you said sounds hollow, it reminded me of my original passion—how do desserts with emotions infused create different experiences for customers? I want to explore this question myself in future.']
["At least I can collect all kinds of data during the process, so I'll be more confident next time I argue with Grey."]
['...But to really do that kind of research, I need a stable environment.']
['Meaning...?']
["Fine, you win. Dolly's Bakery will join the committee."]
["Let's work together."]
['—You have added each other as friends. Start chatting!—']
['Hello, Mr. Donovan. I am [PlayerName] from the committee of business owners.']
["Hello there! I've heard of you—your reputation precedes you, Commandant of Gray Raven."]

["You are such a legend! I finally get the chance to meet you in person. Just thinking of the idea already gets me excited. In fact, I'm already worried that I won't be able to sleep tonight. But then again, maybe that's a good thing if we hit it off and chat through the night. Allow me to think of our first topic..."]
["Wait a sec... Mr. Donovan, I appreciate your kindness, but we don't have much time. Maybe we can first confirm a few details of the book corner and continue this conversation afterward?"]
['Ah, right—the book corner!']
['Your team has already contacted me, and I understand the situation. I can provide some of my collection to help you build the book corner, but I also have a favor to ask.']
["Please tell me. I'll do everything I can to help."]
["I'd like you to retrieve a few lost books from this list. They all have chips installed, so you can follow the signal to locate them and bring them back."]
["I've been too busy to go myself. If you can help me find them, the book corner won't be a problem!"]
["Got it. I'll go find the books then. Thank you."]
["Don't worry. Just remember to finish our conversation when this is all over!"]
['Thanks for your hard work, now all the books have been recovered. You have passed the test—I can now entrust this task to you with confidence.']
['Test?']
["My apologies, it's just my personal habit—I need practical proof to make myself feel better."]
["They may be dated, but I just can't part with them."]
['We understand. You must have considered carefully before lending those books.']
["I can collect them, but I shouldn't restrict them. Only on the right bookshelf can they reach their true potential."]
["That's exactly our ultimate goal in building this book corner. We'll do our best to make that happen."]
['I knew I could trust you. The Spinning Top only follows money—they wanted me to upload all my collection to a digital database and destroy the physical copies to raise the price.']
["As if I care about the money! I didn't collect books to make a profit!"]
['I feel like something invisible flashed before my eyes...']
['By the way, have you decided on a new name for the book corner? Just calling it the "book corner" is a bit plain.']
['How about "Window of the Soul"?']
["From a small window, one can step into a whole new world. Beyond the book lies a free world built for all readers—that's how we are going to promote it."]
['"Window of the Soul" is perfect! What a wonderful concept. Now anyone can pick a book they love and enjoy it slowly in a quiet place like this.']
["We don't have to force everyone into this old-school way of reading, but we should preserve the tradition for those who cherish printed books."]
["We will. It's one of the proofs of human civilization."]
['There will always be someone who is willing to remember it forever.']
['Commandant, WGAA has restored a film about Froggie.']
["If you have time, let's go see it together."]
['We could go right now.']
['We could go right now.']
['Right now, the film can only be watched using a device called the Immersion Projector.']
["It's a new piece of tech developed by the association, and they're currently running a trial for it."]
["I'll see if I can get us two trial vouchers."]
['I already have those vouchers.']
["Leonie gave me a few last time I helped her out. I'll grab them from my lounge."]
['Perfect, that saves us the trouble of waiting in line.']
["I'll wait for you at Sequence Square. See you soon."]
["Commandant, did you see today's news feed?"]
['Looks like a lot of shops at the Orbital Corridor are hosting events. Want to check them out?']
["Sounds like fun. Let's take a look after the Froggie movie."]
['Froggie... movie?']
['The one you told me about—the film WGAA restored.']
['I told you about it?']
["I don't remember that. Could you be mistaken, Commandant?"]
["Let's meet at Sequence Square first. We can talk more there."]
["Alright. I'll be there soon."]
["Commandant, did you see today's news feed?"]
['Looks like a lot of shops at the Orbital Corridor are hosting events. Want to check them out?']
["I'm sure you sent this exact message yesterday."]
["I just checked the message log and didn't find anything like that. Maybe you remembered it wrong, Commandant?"]
['Let me check mine too.']
['...Nothing there either.']
["Anyway, let's meet at Sequence Square first. We'll talk more there."]
["Alright. I'll be there soon."]
["Commandant, did you see today's news feed?"]
['Looks like a lot of shops at the Orbital Corridor are hosting events. Want to check them out?']
['Are you still resting, Commandant?']
["Lucia, there's something I want to talk to you about."]
["Let's meet at Sequence Square. There's something I need to tell you."]
["Got it. I'll be there soon."]
['[PlayerName], got a minute?']
["I-I'm in trouble."]
['What is it?']
['What is it?']
['Those guys... they sent a threatening letter to my home!']
["I'm heading to the cafe now. Can we talk in person?"]
["Got it. I'll wait for you there."]
["Got it. I'll wait for you there."]
['Hah, let me guess, that coward went crying to you again?']
['What are you trying to say?', 'No one asked you...']
['What are you trying to say?']
['No one asked you...']
['Kuroro Coffee belongs to me. Nothing escapes my eyes.']
["Maru Bear just messaged me. Said you've got proof that Pete was behind it."]
['Been sleeping better, Manager?', 'Have you been resting well lately, Manager?']
['Been sleeping better, Manager?']
['Have you been resting well lately, Manager?']
["Absolutely! The cafe's been looking great lately. I really appreciate everything you've done."]
['Looking forward to your continued support in the business, [PlayerName].']
['Sure thing.']
['Come on, [PlayerName], cut me some slack...']
['Sign this agreement and we can stop dragging things out.']
["You're a model business owner. Set a good example for the others!"]
["Greetings, Gray Raven Commandant. I'm Huaiyue, representative of the Kowloong Chamber of Commerce."]
["Thanks to your support, our branch at the outer square opened without any trouble. I'm here today to let you know that we'd like to join the committee."]
["That's great news. Thank you for your support."]
["That's great news. Thank you for your support."]
['Also, I wanted to report a commercial dispute.']
["I've learned there's been some tension between Akdilek and the Ocean Heart flagship store."]
["I'm worried this could impact business operations across the square. Would you be able to mediate and help resolve the issue?"]
["Understood. I'll handle it right away."]
["Understood. I'll handle it right away."]
["Got a job, huh? Good thing I'm stocked up on electrolytes."]
["Got a job, huh? Good thing I'm stocked up on electrolytes."]
['Your message alert broke my combo... You owe me double this time!']
['Skip the small talk. What tech issue are you stuck on now?']
['The marquee at the square was tampered with. Can you help us find the culprit?']
['The marquee at the square was tampered with. Can you help us find the culprit?']
["Sure. You've got admin access, right? Sync the logs over to me."]
['(Data synchronizing)']
['Whoever did this was cautious. They hacked three public terminals to use as intermediaries before hitting the server.']
['Is there any way to catch them?']
['Is there any way to catch them?']
['Of course. No data is ever truly trace-free. Ever heard of geographic profiling?']
['If I can gather enough log data, I can narrow down where the hacker was working from.']
["I've sent you the coordinates for the public terminals. Just hook them up to your terminal and send the data my way."]
['Got it. Thanks.']
['Got it. Thanks.']
['Commandant, is Lucia with you right now?']
['Yes, she mentioned something about a surprise earlier. Is it ready?']
["It is! Kuroro Coffee is holding a new event today. They're announcing the participant list now, and then they'll open the event area."]
["I just got an email. Gray Raven's application was approved!"]
['Should we wait for you and Lee to go together?', 'Do you want us to come meet up with you two?']
['Should we wait for you and Lee to go together?']
['Do you want us to come meet up with you two?']
["Lee's on an urgent mission. He told us to go ahead without him. He'll join us next time."]
["I'm finishing up some work in the greenhouse. I'll meet you both at Kuroro Coffee once I'm done."]
['Would you and Lucia mind going to the designated spot to register our names and collect the invitations, Commandant?']
["You've worked hard. Thank you for preparing all this.", "Got it. We'll handle it."]
["You've worked hard. Thank you for preparing all this."]
["Got it. We'll handle it."]
['Being with everyone makes it all worth it.']
["Then I'll leave it to you, Commandant."]
["I've sent the coordinates for the registration location to your terminal."]
['See you soon, Commandant.']
['Commandant, did you receive the souvenirs?']
["I'm at the public navigation point now. The photo system is ready."]
["Once you're here, we can begin."]
["Got it. We're heading over now."]
['[PlayerName], please help us!']
['What happened?']
['The higher-ups recently approved a new development plan. Lots of new businesses have moved into the square, but...']
["Everyone's been getting nasty threatening letters, demanding they join some group called the Flourish Guild."]
["If this keeps up, the square won't be able to operate normally."]
["Word is, you've got some powerful connections. Could you report this and get someone to investigate? I'm really counting on you!"]
["Sorry to bother you, [PlayerName], but there's something I'd like to ask for your help."]
['I have a friend named Rhea. On a recent mission, her unit got ambushed by Hetero-Creatures.']
['In the end, she was among the very few who made it out... She was left deeply traumatized and is now in therapy at Babylonia.']
['While Rhea is making a good recovery, she still seems to keep a wall up around others, which could hinder her progress.']
["The doctor said she might open up more to someone who's been to the battlefield. I thought about it, and you're my top pick."]
["I know this is a lot to ask, but if there's an opportunity, I hope you might consider helping this poor girl."]
['Sure thing.', "I'll do my best."]
['Sure thing.']
["I'll do my best."]
["Thank you, [PlayerName]. You can talk to Rhea's psychologist later. She'll fill you in on the details. I'll have her send you her location now."]
["I'm terribly sorry for troubling you."]
["Here's what happened. Due to an error in the factory's detection system, a batch of defective Kuroros were mistakenly deemed qualified and deployed for use in various locations."]
["We immediately dispatched people to retrieve them, but our manpower is really limited... By the way, Gray Raven Commandant, I wonder if you're available right now?"]
['What is it?', 'You want me to help retrieve the Kuroros?']
['What is it?']
['You want me to help retrieve the Kuroros?']
['As you can see, these Kuroros sometimes get too close to people, which could be risky.']
['The system shows there are three more defective Kuroros near you. Could you please help us retrieve them if possible?']
["These Kuroros are all very innocent. Just coax them gently according to their personalities, and they'll follow you willingly."]
["Of course, we won't have you work for nothing. We'll provide appropriate compensation afterwards."]
['You can count on me.', 'Well, for the sake of the compensation...']
['You can count on me.']
['Well, for the sake of the compensation...']
["Thank you so much! I'll send you their locations later."]
["After you've retrieved all three remaining ones, please notify me and we'll arrange for the subsequent recycling."]
